 33/// Apply a small meta-program to determine the proper tag for handling
 34/// an assignment:
 35///
 36///    if LHS and RHS are serial, use serial
 37///    else if LHS and RHS are simple distributed, use par_assign
 38///    else (LHS and RHS are distributed expression) use par_expr
 39template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS, bool EarlyBinding>
 40struct Dispatcher_helper
 41{
 42  typedef typename LHS::map_type lhs_map_type;
 43  typedef typename RHS::map_type rhs_map_type;
 44
 45  // Cannot mix local and distributed data in expressions.
 46  static bool const is_illegal    =
 47    !((Is_local_map<lhs_map_type>::value && Is_local_map<rhs_map_type>::value) ||
 48      (Is_global_map<lhs_map_type>::value && Is_global_map<rhs_map_type>::value));
 49
 50  static bool const is_local      = Is_local_map<lhs_map_type>::value &&
 51                                    Is_local_map<rhs_map_type>::value;
 52  static bool const is_rhs_expr   = Is_expr_block<RHS>::value;
 53  static bool const is_rhs_simple = Is_simple_distributed_block<RHS>::value;
 54  static bool const is_rhs_reorg  = Is_par_reorg_ok<RHS>::value;
 55
 56  static bool const is_lhs_split  = Is_split_block<LHS>::value;
 57  static bool const is_rhs_split  = Is_split_block<RHS>::value;
 58
 59  static int const  lhs_cost      = Ext_data_cost<LHS>::value;
 60  static int const  rhs_cost      = Ext_data_cost<RHS>::value;
 61
 62  typedef typename
 63  Choose_par_assign_impl<D, LHS, RHS, EarlyBinding>::type par_assign_type;
 64
 65  typedef 
 66  typename conditional<is_illegal,    illegal_mix_of_local_and_global_in_assign,
 67  typename conditional<is_local,      serial_expr,
 68  typename conditional<is_rhs_simple, par_assign<par_assign_type>,
 69  typename conditional<is_rhs_reorg,  par_expr,
 70                       /* else */     par_expr_noreorg>::type
 71	              >::type 
 72	              >::type
 73	              >::type type;
 74};
 75
 76/// Specialization for serial, 1-dimensional assignment.
 77template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
 78struct Dispatcher<1, LHS, RHS, serial_expr>
 79{
 80  typedef typename Block_layout<LHS>::layout_type lhs_layout_type;
 81  typedef typename Block_layout<RHS>::layout_type rhs_layout_type;
 82
 83  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 84  {
 85#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 86    length_type const size = lhs.size(1, 0);
 87    for (index_type i=0; i<size; ++i) lhs.put(i, rhs.get(i));
 88#else
 89    using namespace vsip_csl;
 90    dispatch<dispatcher::op::assign<1>, void, LHS &, RHS const &>(lhs, rhs);
 91#endif
 92  }
 93};
 94
 95/// Specialization for serial, 2-dimensional assignment.
 96template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
 97struct Dispatcher<2, LHS, RHS, serial_expr>
 98{
 99  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
100  {
101#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
102    length_type const rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
103    length_type const cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
104    for (index_type i=0; i<rows; ++i)
105      for (index_type j=0; j<cols; ++j)
106	lhs.put(i, j, rhs.get(i, j));
107#else
108    using namespace vsip_csl;
109    dispatch<dispatcher::op::assign<2>, void, LHS &, RHS const &>(lhs, rhs);
110#endif
111  }
112};
113
114/// Specialization for serial, 3-dimensional assignment.
115template <typename LHS, typename RHS>
116struct Dispatcher<3, LHS, RHS, serial_expr>
117{
118  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
119  {
120#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
121    length_type const size0 = lhs.size(3, 0);
122    length_type const size1 = lhs.size(3, 1);
123    length_type const size2 = lhs.size(3, 2);
124
125    for (index_type i=0; i<size0; ++i)
126      for (index_type j=0; j<size1; ++j)
127        for (index_type k=0; k<size2; ++k)
128          lhs.put(i, j, k, rhs.get(i, j, k));
129#else
130    using namespace vsip_csl;
131    dispatch<dispatcher::op::assign<3>, void, LHS &, RHS const &>(lhs, rhs);
132#endif
133  }
134};
135
136/// Specialization for parallel assignment, RHS is simple (A = B)
137template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS, typename Assign>
138struct Dispatcher<D, LHS, RHS, par_assign<Assign> >
139{
140  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
141  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;  
142  typedef typename LHS::map_type lhs_map_type;
143  typedef typename View_of_dim<D, lhs_value_type, LHS>::type lhs_view_type;
144  typedef typename View_of_dim<D, rhs_value_type, RHS>::const_type rhs_view_type;
145
146  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
147  {
148    if (Is_par_same_map<D, lhs_map_type, RHS>::value(lhs.map(), rhs))
149    {
150      // Maps are same, no communication required.
151      typedef typename Distributed_local_block<LHS>::type lhs_local_block_type;
152      typedef typename Distributed_local_block<RHS>::type rhs_local_block_type;
153      typedef typename 
154	View_block_storage<lhs_local_block_type>::type::equiv_type 
155	lhs_local_storage_type;
156      typedef typename 
157	View_block_storage<rhs_local_block_type>::type::equiv_type
158	rhs_local_storage_type;
159
160      lhs_local_storage_type lhs_local_block = get_local_block(lhs);
161      rhs_local_storage_type rhs_local_block = get_local_block(rhs);
162
163      Dispatcher<D, lhs_local_block_type, rhs_local_block_type>::exec(lhs_local_block,
164								      rhs_local_block);
165    }
166    else
167    {
168      lhs_view_type lhs_view(lhs);
169      rhs_view_type rhs_view(const_cast<RHS&>(rhs));
170      Par_assign<D, lhs_value_type, rhs_value_type, LHS, RHS, Assign>
171	pa(lhs_view, rhs_view);
172      pa();
173    }
174  }
175};
176
177/// Specialization for distributed expressions where the RHS can be
178/// reorganized.
179template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS>
180struct Dispatcher<D, LHS, RHS, par_expr>
181{
182  typedef typename LHS::map_type lhs_map_type;
183  typedef typename 
184  View_of_dim<D, typename LHS::value_type, LHS>::type lhs_view_type;
185  typedef typename 
186  View_of_dim<D, typename RHS::value_type, RHS>::const_type rhs_view_type;
187
188  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
189  {
190    if (Is_par_same_map<D, lhs_map_type, RHS>::value(lhs.map(), rhs))
191    {
192      // Maps are same, no communication required.
193      typedef typename Distributed_local_block<LHS>::type lhs_local_block_type;
194      typedef typename Distributed_local_block<RHS>::type rhs_local_block_type;
195      typedef typename 
196	View_block_storage<lhs_local_block_type>::type::equiv_type 
197	lhs_local_storage_type;
198      typedef typename 
199	View_block_storage<rhs_local_block_type>::type::equiv_type 
200	rhs_local_storage_type;
201
202      lhs_local_storage_type lhs_local_block = get_local_block(lhs);
203      rhs_local_storage_type rhs_local_block = get_local_block(rhs);
204
205      Dispatcher<D, lhs_local_block_type, rhs_local_block_type>::exec(lhs_local_block,
206								      rhs_local_block);
207    }
208    else
209    {
210      // Maps are different, fall out to general expression.
211      lhs_view_type lhs_view(lhs);
212      rhs_view_type rhs_view(const_cast<RHS&>(rhs));
213      impl::par_expr(lhs_view, rhs_view);
214    }
215  }
216};
217
218/// Specialization for distributed expressions that cannot be reorganized.
219/// 
220/// Types of expressions that cannot be reorganized:
221///  - Vmmul_expr_blocks
222template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS>
223struct Dispatcher<D, LHS, RHS, par_expr_noreorg>
224{
225  typedef typename LHS::map_type lhs_map_type;
226
227  typedef typename 
228  View_of_dim<D, typename LHS::value_type, LHS>::type lhs_view_type;
229  typedef typename 
230  View_of_dim<D, typename RHS::value_type, RHS>::const_type rhs_view_type;
231
232  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
233  {
234    if (Is_par_same_map<D, lhs_map_type, RHS>::value(lhs.map(), rhs))
235    {
236      // Maps are same, no communication required.
237      typedef typename Distributed_local_block<LHS>::type lhs_local_block_type;
238      typedef typename Distributed_local_block<RHS>::type rhs_local_block_type;
239      typedef typename 
240	View_block_storage<lhs_local_block_type>::type::equiv_type 
241	lhs_local_storage_type;
242      typedef typename 
243	View_block_storage<rhs_local_block_type>::type::equiv_type
244	rhs_local_storage_type;
245
246      lhs_local_storage_type lhs_local_block = get_local_block(lhs);
247      rhs_local_storage_type rhs_local_block = get_local_block(rhs);
248
249      Dispatcher<D, lhs_local_block_type, rhs_local_block_type>::exec(lhs_local_block,
250								      rhs_local_block);
251    }
252    else
253    {
254      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(impl::unimplemented("Expression cannot be reorganized"));
255    }
256  }
257};
258} // namespace vsip::impl::assignment
259
260/// Assign one block to another.
261/// This process involves a fairly involved multi-dispatch logic.
262template <dimension_type D, typename LHS, typename RHS>
263inline void 
264assign(LHS &lhs, RHS &rhs)
265{
266  assignment::Dispatcher<D, LHS, RHS>::exec(lhs, rhs);
267}
268
269} // namespace vsip::impl
270} // namespace vsip
